recommendations.insight: The hotel rate cap for New York City ($350) was flagged as an exception on 32 compliant trips in the last 90 days. 95% of these exceptions were manually approved due to conference season pricing.
recommendations.recommendation: Consider increasing the NYC hotel cap to $375 to reduce exception handling by an estimated 28%.
recommendations.impact: Reduces manual exception reviews, saving an estimated 5 hours of administrative work per month.
recommendations.context: Peak conference season in NYC (Q3-Q4) consistently drives hotel rates above current policy limits. Most exceptions are legitimate business needs for client-facing meetings.
recommendations.risk_assessment: Low risk - historical approval rate suggests policy is too restrictive for market conditions

recommendations.insight: Coffee expenses in San Francisco exceed the $10 daily limit 67% of the time, primarily due to client entertainment and specialty coffee meetings.
recommendations.recommendation: Increase SF coffee/meeting allowance to $15/day or create separate 'client entertainment' category.
recommendations.impact: Eliminates 23 exception reviews per month, improving traveler experience.
recommendations.context: SF's premium coffee culture and client meeting expectations drive higher coffee expenses. Current policy doesn't account for client entertainment needs.
recommendations.risk_assessment: Medium risk - need to distinguish between personal and client entertainment expenses

recommendations.insight: International car rentals in Paris exceed policy limits 45% of the time due to automatic transmission requirements and insurance add-ons.
recommendations.recommendation: Create separate policy tier for international rentals with higher limits and mandatory insurance coverage.
recommendations.impact: Reduces international travel friction while maintaining cost controls.
recommendations.context: European car rentals often require automatic transmission upgrades and comprehensive insurance, driving costs above standard policy limits.
recommendations.risk_assessment: Low risk - international travel has different cost structures and requirements
recommendations.savings_potential: $3,200 annually in improved traveler satisfaction and reduced delays
